name: Fill the Void (PFLAtm)
description:
collect stones and throw them in the constantly growing voidhole to slow its growth.

Move with WASD and walk over stones, if you grabbed one walk in the gray deposit zone but don't touch the black voidhole or your adventure is over.

Fill the Void was made for Trijam#208 in ca. 4.5 hours  with Raylib
